snippet: Move over Uggie, Cosmo and Blackie. Triumph the Insult Comic Dog wants in on the awards-season action. Never mind that he's human and hasn't been in a film.
abstract: Move over Uggie, Cosmo and Blackie. Triumph the Insult Comic Dog wants in on the awards-season action. Never mind that he's human and hasn't been in a film.

headline.main: A Puppet Dog Wants Some Respect
